message.content: This question is straightforward and requires basic knowledge about blindness. Blind people are unable to see, so asking them to look at something would be rude and insensitive. Options (A), (B), and (D) are incorrect because they do not reflect the reason why asking a blind person to look at something is considered rude.

Option (D) is incorrect because being blind does not prevent someone from living.
